definition: to get smart/to resort to petty tricks
to play with/to wield/to act (cool etc)/to display (a skill, one's temper etc)

bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

to seize every opportunity/to be full of tricks
a clever person may become the victim of his own ingenuity (idiom); cleverness may overreach itself/too smart for one's own good

definition: to resort to tricks/to act in a slippery way/to try to evade (work, responsibility)
